name: Mars Alone
description:
Hi everybody ! We are glad to post our first game issued from a GameJam. We called it "Mars Alone" : Because you're alone... on mars ! You will have to deal with your hunger, breathable air reserve , and with your water tank ! You can make you crops growing by watering your hydroponic farm. You can craft air filter with coal and water filter with sand.
You will need to go outside of your shelter in order to find ressources, but dont forget to back before falling of exaustion.
